items.content_html:
1. PharMeDoc Pregnancy Pillow with Jersey Cover, C Shaped Full Body Pillow

PharMeDoc is specialized in pillow comfort, especially for the expecting mother. It is one of the most popular among body pillows. This c-shaped pillow design is specific for supporting the discomfort of pregnancy surrounding back needs, as well as support for, hips, knees, neck, and head. Because of this innovative c shape design, it will replace the necessity of multiple pillows in bed. With the support of this great pillow, you will be able to watch television, read a book or do your office works on your computer.

The 62-inch length and 29-inch width that is entirely adjustable take measures this full body, slightly c-shaped pillow versatility to use at any point in your pregnancy, or even for body pillow support evermore. C-shape pregnancy pillow can help comfort you into better sleep, decrease obstacle entirely the night and helping relieve back pain connected with pregnancy. PharMeDoc C-Shape full body pillow replaces the need for up to multiple pillows. uphold your head, neck, spine, belly, back, hips, and legs.

C Shaped Full Body Pillow seriously is so soft and comfortable. What's great is that you can twist and fold the thing in a lot of different ways to accommodate how you are feeling & how your body is changing. This pillow is a pregnancy game-changer.

This c-shaped full body pillow easy to clean, easy to rearrange and is incredibly soft.
locality this product in a number of configurations on your bed, couch, sofa, or even the floor.

Specifiations:

Brand PharMeDoc
Product dimentions 61.8 x 29.1 x 5.9 inches
Pillow Size Body
Material type 100% Soft Jersey Knit Cotton
Item model number PMD-C-BP-JC
Type Maternity Pillow
Fill Material Cotton Blend
Color Grey, Blue, Pink, Mint Green
Item weight 7.05 Pounds

2.Pregnancy Pillow, Full Body Maternity Pillow with Contoured U-Shape by Bluestone, Back Support

 

This pregnancy pillow is the only full body maternity pillow from the Bluestone. It is an exclusive item from this manufacturer. They ensured the most comfort and best price of the entire line of products. The best feature of this pillow is, it is multifunctional. You can use this as a pillow, as a bed or even as a sofa. So, basically you can sleep, you can watch TV, you can work on a laptop, or just relax while your baby is still supported elevated.

Because of the uniquely designed U-shaped generously oversized architecture, you will have support in the neck, shoulders, back and hips together all night long. And definitely, it will support your precious belly. It works like multiple pillows. You will not feel to toss and turn sides. If you are pregnant and uncomfortable you need one of these in your life. It provides support and cushion. It has good support all the way around.

This pregnancy pillow is wonderful. It allows you to sit in the living room for much longer. Also, who those side sleeper and this really helps him. It’s also pretty affordable if you look at other body pillows. 100% recommended. this pillow not only supports the tummy really well but supports you back as well. This full body maternity pillow feels like a nice down pillow and can be used for breastfeeding if that is something you are thinking about trying. Overall, this is a great product and I would say it’s a must-have for any mom-to-be.this product hugs the body and is so comfortable. The removable pillowcase is also a huge plus.

Specifiations:

Brand Bluestone
Model 64-PREGN-U-WHI
Product Name Pregnancy Pillow
Function Back Support
Product Dimensions 60 x 38 x 7 inches
Item Weight 7.25 pounds
Color White
Filling Polyester Hollow Fiber
Outer Cover 100% Cotton
Inner cover polypropylene
Material 100% Polyester
Shape  U-Shape
Use Bedding,Body,Hotel,Sleeping
Feature Anti-Apnea,Therapy

 

3. Hiccapop Pregnancy Pillow Wedge for Maternity

The unique feature of Hiccapop pregnancy pillow wedge is, it has different softness on a different side.One side with Deluxe, soft memory foam and other side has firmer support foam.It’s two-sided design provides comfort to the expecting mom during all the three trimesters.Proper belly support during pregnancy is very important to avoid swelling (edema) in hands, legs, and feet. You can place this pillow under your belly, behind your back or between your knees to help you feel more comfortable relaxing or sleeping. This is a versatile belly wedge, back pillow or knee pillow. It helps relieve nerve pain and leg numbness, too.

It has an unbelievably soft cover made with plush Velboa. Though the cover has made with super soft cloth yet it is durable and washable. Considering the little pampering that goes a long way in the 3rd trimester, we pulled out all the stops and found the best material possible.Hiccapop pillow wedge has got the world’s best air ventilation system. To keep pillow cooler they used CertiPUR-US which is free of PBDEs, TDCPP or TCEP ("Tris") flame retardants, mercury, lead, heavy metals, formaldehyde, phthalates regulated by the CPSC, and CFCs.

It includes its own travel bag to carry it everywhere. Because of the compact and portable size, you can take it to the bedroom to the couch to your favorite chair for napping. Oversized body pillows are usually bulky and hot. But this convenient size pillow has a very big plus in this case.

Spefications:

Manufacturer hiccapop
Item model number FBA_B01KG84CLI
Color Charcoal Grey
Product Dimensions 13.2 x 15 x 4.5 inches
Item Weight 11.2 ounces
Function Body, Belly, Back, Knees support

 

  4. Queen Rose U-Shaped Total Body Pillow

Queen Rose Company name has become synonymous over the years with high quality products for mom and baby to help make life both more comfortable and affordable. solidity and extra pleasurable, this unique Bionic Polyethylene filling without smelling provides comfort for side sleeping and retains fluffiness for better performance and longer use.

This pregnancy body pillow creates a support position for reading, nursing, watching TV, sleeping, and breastfeeding, therefore, this pillow can provide better sleep. A favorite for pregnant mothers and people suffering from hip or back pain, fibromyalgia, sciatica, poor posture, athletes, people in physical therapy or recovering from an injury, and anyone looking to get better sleep.Comfort and support, allergenic are now available with great designed to follow the shape of the pregnancy mom, and big "U" shaped maternity support pillow for sleeping and feeding at home.

This pillow is incredible. This is a lovely choice for pregnant mothers at any point in their pregnancy term, as well as anyone else wanted a supportive position for any kind of recovery that requires you to be positioned a certain way.  Though the loft is a bit higher, it provides good cradling support and gives well under pressure. The plush feel of the pillow cradles your body and allows you to relax without putting undue pressure on joints or embrace on your back.This pillow is also easily Removable Cotton Cover and is a neutral color to help match any decor.

Spefications:

Manufacturer QUEEN ROSE
Product Dimensions 55 x 31 x 7.8 inches

Item Weight 7.28 pounds

Size 55in, 61in
